page.title: 03Shopping in Barton
page.content: The main shopping areas in Barton are Main St.and Oak Rd.with general stores to be found in Mill Lane and The Green. A variety of goods may be bought in the local shops ranging from food to video- films.In Barton there are four self service food shops,two butchers,two newsagents selling stationery and sweets,a bank,two hairdressers,a D.I.Y. store,a Chinese takeaway and fish and chip shop,a post office selling books stationery and sweets,a pet food and fishing shop,an electrical goods shop,a television video shop,a launderette,and a haberdashers and outfitters. Many families who have their own transport prefer to do their main shopping in Sainsbury's and Tesco's,the large supermarkets in Burton-On-Trent. Those who are without their own transport and the elderly prefer to shop almost exclusively in Barton.
